title: I'M SICK TO DEATH OF AFKER'S
body: ok ive had enough of afk'ers i've been demoted 3 times this week, and when i win, i only win say 10-17 Lp and i lose bloody 26-32 wtf is going on ..if this keeps up i'm literally going to spread the biggest fucking rumor of how rigged your matchmaking system that no on is really want play ranked, seriously do something about the bloody afk's or put me back in silver 5 i did not deserve those people in my games and it was constantly one after each other .. im so fucking sick of it ..its made me literally create a new account and level that up so when i rank up i'll at least be silver in that account, DO SOMETHING ABOUT THE AFK'ERS!

replies.body:
If you lose more LP than you gain it means the system is actively trying to kick you down as it doesn't approve of your current position and thinks that you should be lower on the ladder.

Improve your performance per game.
